attributes.action: Help the british homeless people who sleep on the streets.
attributes.additional_details: What evidence? Just walk the streets of any major town see it with your own eyes.
attributes.background: Its really good were helping refugees and giving them a good home and support. How about helping british homeless people too? Whenever i am in cardiff town i never just walk past a homeless people.it breaks me inside, i give them food and water and chat to them. They need our help aswell.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107542

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
